fields_of_interest: Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Communication
head_office_address: Mundipharma International Limited Unit 194 Cambridge Science Park Milton Road
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Mundipharma global network of privately-owned independent associated companies, including Napp Pharmaceuticals Ltd in the UK, was founded in 1956 by doctors and now operates in over 120 countries worldwide. We are focused on developing business partnerships to identify and accelerate meaningful technology across an increasingly diverse portfolio of therapy areas including respiratory, oncology, pain, and biosimilars. Consistent with our entrepreneurial heritage, we like to think we see what others don’t by challenging conventional wisdom and asking different and challenging questions. By working in partnership with all our stakeholders, the Mundipharma network develops medicines that create value for patients, payers and wider healthcare systems.
